short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make your new tab page display a crafty scene based on the weather!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⛅Customize your new tabs with a scene from a blocky video game based on the weather!

Tip: Switch between Celsius and Fahrenheit by clicking on the extension icon!

All screenshots use John Smith Legacy and SEUS PTGI!
Support James Stone and Sonic Ether on Patreon:
https://www.patreon.com/sonicether
https://www.patreon.com/bePatron?u=9104925

Features ⚡
Unique images for 8 different weather conditions.
Dynamically adjusts to the time of day.
Fast resizing ensures images always fill the screen.
Network requests never block the rendering of new tabs.
Infrequent background updates keep weather current without battery drain.
Simple switching between Celsius and Fahrenheit.
Completely local and private — no data collection.
